reviews.name: TNT Pickleballs, 12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: I have tried these pickleballs on an outdoor court and was very pleased to see that they were perfect. I do recommend them.
reviews.title: Pickleballnow 12 pack outdoor rated

reviews.name: TNT Pickleballs, 12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: These are being used by a wide range of players in a community situation. They are not favored by more experienced players who feel the bounce is "off". For novice players, kids and practice balls they work fine. We have not had them in rotation long enough to determine how well they stand up. They do have a noticeable seam which may shorten their lifespan. For the price they are serving the purpose so far.
reviews.title: Utility use

reviews.name: TNT Pickleballs, 12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: these pickle balls are good they seem strong enough that they won't crack after much use. recommended for beginners as well as advanced players.
reviews.title: good balls

reviews.name: TNT Pickleballs, 12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 12 and tried them for a few minutes. Don't waist your money on TNT pickleballs. They are light weight and soft. They don't bounce or carry well compared to other brands. Returned them to Walmart with no problems.
reviews.title: POOR
